channel.title: Banned by Nintendo for no reason?
channel.description:
So yeah, a few weeks ago, I was playing super smash bros brawl the nice way online. There came a fag that started to hack and actually that person turned all of us into giga bowser. As I was playing a few rounds, I got disconnected...
1 Day later....... Whooops: It looks like I got banned...
Calling Shitendo: " You got banned six months ago", they said. I was like WTF???? I got unbanned after that time.
Result: They will never unban my ass ever again.
Conclusion: I used codes/hacks to unban myself + I should have played on my xbox on that day.
And to all of those nintendo shitters: SCREW U FOR BANNING ME FOR NO REASON!
Do u actually think it was right for shitendo to ban me like that...?

item.title: Banned by Nintendo for no reason?
item.dc:creator: @angelofdeath396 angelofdeath396
item.description:
@angelofdeath396 wrote:

drubrkletern:

LEAVE THIS SITE AT ONCE NINTENDRONE

Lol, I never worked for shitendo. The only reason I played on my wii wuz cuz…

  1. My xbox wasn’t in my grandma’s house, which I was at that time.

  2. I got bored (I play wii around once or twice a Year. Btw Im an xbox person anyways…and no…Im not 12, im 16…

  3. And wutz more sad is that my other friend who apparently is 21 plays the wii… 0___________o

  4. Tbh, Im already thinking of why I posted this…just wanted pples opinion…now Im doubting my wasteful post…

Read full topic
